dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle disagreements or conflicts with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will strongly assert their position and may become confrontational when facing opposition.
Your FarTwin will actively listen to opposing views, seek common ground, and work towards a mutually beneficial solution.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin tackle complex problems or challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach problems in a systematic, methodical manner, relying on data and evidence to guide their decisions.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and rely on creative, outside-the-box thinking to find innovative solutions.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express themselves creatively?

options.description: Your FarTwin will use words, language, and writing to convey their thoughts and emotions.
Your FarTwin will create art, music, or other visual forms of expression to convey their ideas and feelings.

dimensions.label: Risk-Taking Attitude
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new opportunities or challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will eagerly take on new risks and push boundaries to experience excitement and growth.
Your FarTwin will approach new opportunities with caution, weighing the potential benefits against the risks before making a decision.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin show their emotions to others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will freely express their emotions, whether it's happiness, sadness, or anger.
Your FarTwin will carefully consider when and how to share their emotions with others, preferring to keep them private.

dimensions.label: Time Management Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize and manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will set clear goals, prioritize tasks, and work efficiently to achieve them.
Your FarTwin will tend to be more flexible with their schedule, prioritizing leisure time and flexibility over strict deadlines.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others in social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will tend to be outgoing, sociable, and enjoy being around people, often seeking opportunities for social interaction.
Your FarTwin will prefer quieter, more low-key settings, often feeling drained or overwhelmed by too much social interaction.
